languages.text: {n}Махарий не успевает ответить — стоящая подле него Регина замахивается, словно пытаясь дать пощечину старому сенешалю. Уверенным движением сенешаль ловит ее кисть на лету — у самого лица Абеляра замирает изящная ручка, украшенная массивным кольцом-аугментом с тонким, истекающим ядом шипом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В то же мгновение стоящая перед Абеляром женщина делает резкое движение рукой, будто пытаясь дать ему пощечину. Уверенным движением сенешаль ловит ее кисть на лету. У самого лица Абеляра замирает изящная ручка, указательный палец которой украшен кольцом-аугментом с тонким, истекающим ядом шипом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, raises her arm as if to slap the elderly Seneschal. Abelard deftly catches her wrist, stopping her hand right in front of his face. Her dainty hand is adorned with a massive augmetic ring topped with a thin spike dripping with venom.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий не успевает ответить — стоящая подле него Регина замахивается, словно пытаясь дать пощечину старому сенешалю. Уверенным движением сенешаль ловит ее кисть на лету — у самого лица Абеляра замирает изящная ручка, украшенная массивным кольцом-аугментом с тонким, истекающим ядом шипом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, swings her hand, as if wanting to slap the elderly Seneschal. With a firm movement, Abelard catches her wrist on the fly — right before his face stops an elegant hand, adorned by a massive augment ring with a thin spike dripping with poison.{/n}

With a firm movement, Abelard catches her wrist on the fly — right before his face stops an elegant hand, adorned by a massive augment ring with a thin spike dripping with poison.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マハリウスが答える間もなく、彼のそばに立っているレジーナが老家令長に平手打ちを食らわせようと腕を動かす。アベラルドは彼女の手首を巧みに掴み、その手を顔の寸前で止めた。彼女の可憐な手には、細い針から毒を滴らせるオーグメティックの指輪が飾られていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, raises her arm as if to slap the elderly Seneschal. Abelard deftly catches her wrist, stopping her hand right in front of his face. Her dainty hand is adorned with a massive augmetic ring topped with a thin spike dripping with venom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスが答える間もなく、彼のそばに立っているレジーナが老家令長に平手打ちを食らわせようと腕を動かす。アベラルドは彼女の手首を巧みに掴み、その手を顔の寸前で止めた。彼女の可憐な手には、細い針から毒を滴らせるオーグメティックの指輪が飾られていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯还没来得及有所反应，他身旁的蕾吉娜俨然已经扬起了手，似乎打算给面前的老总领一个耳光。然而，她的巴掌还没来得及甩到阿贝拉德脸上，阿贝拉德便灵巧地抓住了她的手腕。她那只精心保养的手上戴着一枚巨大的植入物戒指，一滴毒液正从隐蔽的尖刺上滴落下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, raises her arm as if to slap the elderly Seneschal. Abelard deftly catches her wrist, stopping her hand right in front of his face. Her dainty hand is adorned with a massive augmetic ring topped with a thin spike dripping with venom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯还没来得及有所反应，他身旁的蕾吉娜俨然已经扬起了手，似乎打算给面前的老总领一个耳光。然而，她的巴掌还没来得及甩到阿贝拉德脸上，阿贝拉德便灵巧地抓住了她的手腕。她那只精心保养的手上戴着一枚巨大的植入物戒指，一滴毒液正从隐蔽的尖刺上滴落下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avant même que Macharius n'ait le temps de répondre, Régina, qui se tient à ses côtés, lève le bras dans l'intention de frapper le sénéchal, mais Abélard se saisit prestement de son poignet juste avant que la main délicate de la jeune femme, ornée d'une bague dotée d'une petite aiguille empoisonnée, n'atteigne son visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, raises her arm as if to slap the elderly Seneschal. Abelard deftly catches her wrist, stopping her hand right in front of his face. Her dainty hand is adorned with a massive augmetic ring topped with a thin spike dripping with venom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant même que Macharius n'ait le temps de répondre, Régina, qui se tient à ses côtés, lève le bras dans l'intention de frapper le sénéchal, mais Abélard se saisit prestement de son poignet juste avant que la main délicate de la jeune femme, ornée d'une bague dotée d'une petite aiguille empoisonnée, n'atteigne son visage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A Macharius no le da tiempo a responder. Regina, que está a su lado, mueve la mano como si fuera a abofetear al anciano Senescal. Con un movimiento firme, Abelard atrapa su muñeca y detiene la mano delante su cara. El enorme anillo aumético que lleva en la mano la mujer tiene una espina cuya punta segrega veneno.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, raises her arm as if to slap the elderly Seneschal. Abelard deftly catches her wrist, stopping her hand right in front of his face. Her dainty hand is adorned with a massive augmetic ring topped with a thin spike dripping with venom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A Macharius no le da tiempo a responder. Regina, que está a su lado, mueve la mano como si fuera a abofetear al anciano Senescal. Con un movimiento firme, Abelard atrapa su muñeca y detiene la mano delante su cara. El enorme anillo aumético que lleva en la mano la mujer tiene una espina cuya punta segrega veneno.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius hat keine Zeit, zu reagieren ... Regina, die neben ihm steht, hebt ihren Arm, als wolle sie den betagten Truchsess ohrfeigen. Abelard packt sie allerdings geschickt am Handgelenk und stoppt ihre Hand unmittelbar vor seinem Gesicht. Ihre zierliche Hand schmückt ein augmetischer Ring mit einer dünnen Nadel, aus der Gift tropft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, raises her arm as if to slap the elderly Seneschal. Abelard deftly catches her wrist, stopping her hand right in front of his face. Her dainty hand is adorned with a massive augmetic ring topped with a thin spike dripping with venom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius hat keine Zeit, zu antworten. Regina, die neben ihm steht, schwingt ihre Hand, als würde sie dem alten Truchsess eine Ohrfeige verpassen wollen. Mit einer schnellen Bewegung packt Abelard ihr Handgelenk, kurz vor seine Wange eine elegante Hand gestoppt hätte, die von einem riesigen augmetischen Ring mit einem dünnen Giftstachel geziert wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius cevap vermeye vakit bulamadan yanında duran Regina, âdeta ihtiyar Seneşal'i tokatlamak maksadıyla kolunu kaldırıyor. Abelard, kadının bileğini kavrayıp inmekte olan şamarı yüzünün önünde durduruyor. Kadın, parmağına kocaman bir ogmetik yüzük takmış. Yüzüğün üstündeki ince iğneden zehir damlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius does not have time to respond — Regina, who is standing beside him, raises her arm as if to slap the elderly Seneschal. Abelard deftly catches her wrist, stopping her hand right in front of his face. Her dainty hand is adorned with a massive augmetic ring topped with a thin spike dripping with venom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius cevap vermeye vakit bulamadan yanında duran Regina, âdeta ihtiyar Seneşal'i tokatlamak maksadıyla kolunu kaldırıyor. Abelard, kadının bileğini kavrayıp inmekte olan şamarı yüzünün önünde durduruyor. Kadın, parmağına kocaman bir ogmetik yüzük takmış. Yüzüğün üstündeki ince iğneden zehir damlıyor.{/n}
